name: Actually
description:
Rocket jumping, flying sharks with rocket launchers, explosions - what else do you need?

Also amazing open world gameplay (except you die if you fall off the map)

Instructions are inside the .7z, you might need to install the VC++ runtime. Make sure to install the 32-Bit version (even if you are running on 64-Bit).

Gameplay video! Woot!

Actually it's about ethics in games journalism
